title: How does Wish work with Rage?

posts.author: CriticalMiss
posts.content:
I've been thinking about Wish lately and wanted to get everyone's opinions.

Quick question about Wish that came up in our game last night.

I'd love to hear everyone's experiences with Wish and how it's worked in your games.

What do you all think? Has anyone else had similar questions about Wish?

posts.author: WarlocksWisdom
posts.content:
I've been playing a Tabaxi Ranger in my campaign, and I've noticed that Rage? really impacts how effective the character is in combat.

We had a hilarious situation where our Bard tried to use Rage? to negotiate with a dragon. It went exactly as you'd expect!

Our table uses a house rule for Rage? where we allow more flexibility in how it's applied. It's been working well so far.

I actually disagree with some of the previous comments about Rage?. Based on my experience, it works differently.

In my campaign, we had a situation with Rage? that played out really well. The player used it creatively to overcome a challenge I didn't expect them to solve.
